Name: Peter Boyd

Project Title: Simulating Population Decline of Endangered Species

Description: In this project, I will fit regression models based on historical population estimates of polar bears. Via simulation, I predict future decay and future population estimates, eventually leading to a prediction of when the species may become extinct.
